item.title: Well-Posed Machine Learning Model via Continuous Limit
item.author: Author
item.description: This article introduce “well-posed” machine learning model via Continouous time limit of Machine Learning. Well-Posedness Three Continuous Limt Infinite-Width Limit: Mean-Field Limit of Neural Network Infinite-Depth Limit: ODE/SDE Limit of Neural Network Infinite-Data Limit: Continuous-Time Analysis of Algorithms
